column4: gooday all, i was wondering if anyone could suggest a good gui web page editor
How much experience do you have?
For a newbie I'd recommend nvu. More seasoned users seem to like Quanta. I prefer bluefish.
I don't know what dreamweaver is like, so I can't say which would be most similar. Sorry. So I guess just try nvu, bluefish and Quanta and see if you like any of them.
